tasks.instruction: Convert the existing web-based Vastu architect application at /workspace/react_template/ to a full desktop application using Electron. Tasks include: 1) Set up Electron main process and renderer configuration, 2) Integrate SQLite database for local project storage, 3) Implement real Ollama LLM integration for local AI processing, 4) Add desktop-specific features (file system access, native menus, window management), 5) Configure build system for desktop app packaging, 6) Ensure all 3D visualization and Vastu features work in desktop environment, 7) Create desktop installer/executable, 8) Test offline functionality with local LLM. Maintain all existing MVP features while adding desktop capabilities and local LLM processing.
